fields.email_content:
Thank you for applying for a corporate membership with {{ site_display_name }}. The details of your membership are as follows:

Name: {{ name }}
Address: {{ address }} {{ address2 }}
City/State/ZIP: {{ city }} {{ state }} {{ zip }}
Phone: {{ phone }}

To view the complete application, go to {{ view_link }}

Thanks!

{{ site_contact_name }}
{{ site_contact_email }}
{{ site_display_name }}
Time submitted: {{ time_submitted }}
fields.subject: Corporate Membership Application for {{ name }}

fields.email_content:

Address: {{ address }} {{ address2 }}
City/State/ZIP: {{ city }} {{ state }} {{ zip }}
